sentence.Network_en: The islanders were astonished. They had known him as an amiable beekeeper.
sentence.Network_cn: 岛上的居民都感到吃惊.他们只知道他是个和蔼可亲的养蜂人.

sentence.Network_en: He keeps honeybees, so we call him a beekeeper.
sentence.Network_cn: 他养了很多蜜蜂, 于是我们称他为养蜂人.

sentence.Network_en: For the Californian beekeeper, the pollination season begins in February.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于加利福尼亚的养蜂者来说, 授粉季节开始于二月.

entry.def: A beekeeper is a person who owns and takes care of bees.

means.word_mean: 1. a farmer who keeps bees for their honey

auth_sentence.content: I have no plans to be a beekeeper myself.
